list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a temporary state of mind or feeling.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he appeared to be in a very good mood about something
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta dường như đang ở trong một tâm trạng rất tốt về một cái gì đó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a category or form which indicates whether a verb expresses fact (indicative mood), command (imperative mood), question (interrogative mood), wish (optative mood), or conditionality (subjunctive mood).
any of the valid forms into which each of the figures of a categorical syllogism may occur.
(especially of music) inducing or suggestive of a particular feeling or state of mind.
